summary: An Ordinance authorizing and directing the City Engineer to incur an indebtedness against the General Fund of The City of Seattle, in the sum of One Hundred Thirteen and 87/100 Dollars ($113.87), for the purpose of completing the improvement of the Alley in Block 29, Capitol Hill Addition Division No. 4, by paving the same, as authorized by Ordinance No. 21840, creating Local Improvement District No. 2196.
